title: Revolutionary New Regulation for Cryptocurrencies Coming from the SEC in the US! Here's Everything You Need to Know…
body: According to Bloomberg, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is working on a new regulation called the “innovation exemption” for crypto companies. Accordingly, this exemption aims to provide a more flexible environment for cryptocurrency companies wishing to operate in the United States. According to the report, the SEC aims to implement this practice by the end of the year. This move means that cryptocurrency companies will be exempt from certain regulations and innovative projects can be implemented more easily. With this move, a softer, more encouraging step is being taken towards the cryptocurrency sector in the US. Under normal circumstances, cryptocurrency companies in the US must comply with strict securities laws. This slows down the development of new projects and causes many startups to shift abroad. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Revolutionary New Regulation for Cryptocurrencies Coming from the SEC in the US! Here's Everything You Need to Know…

title: Revolutionary AI Payment Standards: Coinbase and Cloudflare Pave the Way for Future Crypto Transactions
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary AI Payment Standards: Coinbase and Cloudflare Pave the Way for Future Crypto Transactions The world of digital finance is buzzing with exciting news! Coinbase, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, and Cloudflare, a global internet security and performance company, are joining forces. They plan to launch the x402 Foundation, a groundbreaking initiative set to redefine how we interact with digital money. Their core mission? To establish cutting-edge AI payment standards that promise to bring unprecedented innovation and efficiency to the blockchain space. What Are These Revolutionary AI Payment Standards? At its heart, the x402 Foundation aims to integrate artificial intelligence deeply into payment systems. Imagine transactions that are not just faster, but also smarter and more secure. This is the promise of AI payment standards . AI can analyze vast amounts of data, detect anomalies, and even predict potential fraud before it happens. Essentially, AI acts as an intelligent guardian for your digital assets. Enhanced Security: AI can identify suspicious patterns that human systems might miss, significantly reducing the risk of fraud and unauthorized access. Increased Efficiency: Automated processes powered by AI can speed up transaction settlement times, making crypto payments nearly instantaneous. Personalized Experiences: AI can learn user preferences, offering more tailored and seamless payment options. Why is the Coinbase-Cloudflare Partnership Crucial for AI Payment Standards? This collaboration brings together two powerhouses, each contributing unique strengths to the development of robust AI payment standards . Coinbase provides deep expertise in the cryptocurrency ecosystem, understanding the nuances of blockchain technology, digital assets, and user behavior in the crypto world. They know what works and what challenges users face. On the other hand, Cloudflare offers its extensive global network infrastructure and advanced security services. They protect millions of websites and online services from cyber threats, ensuring speed and reliability. This combination is a perfect match for building secure, scalable, and intelligent payment systems. The synergy between these two giants means the x402 Foundation can leverage: Coinbase’s understanding of crypto markets and user needs. Cloudflare’s robust infrastructure for secure and fast data transfer. A shared vision for a more intelligent and safer digital economy. How Will AI Payment Standards Transform Your Crypto Experience? For everyday users and businesses, the implementation of advanced AI payment standards promises a smoother, more reliable digital transaction experience. Think about instant confirmations, fewer errors, and a reduced need for manual oversight. For example, AI could automatically optimize transaction fees based on network congestion, ensuring you always get the best deal. Moreover, businesses can expect more efficient reconciliation processes and enhanced fraud prevention, leading to significant cost savings and improved operational security. This move will make cryptocurrency not just a speculative asset, but a practical, everyday payment method that feels intuitive and trustworthy. Navigating the Future: Potential Challenges for AI Payment Standards While the vision for AI payment standards is incredibly promising, the journey will undoubtedly present its own set of challenges. One major hurdle involves establishing universal adoption. Different regions and companies might have varying regulatory requirements, making it complex to create a single, unified standard that everyone accepts. Furthermore, concerns about data privacy and the ethical implications of AI in financial transactions will need careful consideration. The foundation will need to address: Regulatory Landscape: Navigating diverse global financial regulations to ensure compliance. Interoperability: Ensuring new standards work seamlessly across different blockchains and traditional payment systems. User Education: Helping users understand and trust AI-powered financial tools. Overcoming these challenges will be key to the widespread success and integration of AI in payments. The launch of the x402 Foundation by Coinbase and Cloudflare marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of digital payments. By focusing on AI payment standards , they are not just improving existing systems; they are building the framework for a more intelligent, secure, and efficient financial future. This collaboration could pave the way for a world where digital transactions are not only instantaneous but also proactively protected and optimized by artificial intelligence, making crypto an even more integral part of our daily lives. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary goal of the x402 Foundation? A1: The x402 Foundation aims to establish and promote advanced AI-based payment standards for digital transactions, enhancing security, efficiency, and user experience. Q2: Which companies are behind the x402 Foundation? A2: The x402 Foundation is a collaborative effort launched by leading cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase and global internet security provider Cloudflare. Q3: How will AI improve payment standards? A3: AI will improve payment standards by enabling faster transaction processing, superior fraud detection, personalized payment experiences, and enhanced overall security for digital payments. Q4: What are some potential challenges for implementing these new AI payment standards? A4: Key challenges include navigating complex global regulations, ensuring interoperability across different platforms, addressing data privacy concerns, and fostering widespread user adoption. Q5: When can we expect to see these AI payment standards in widespread use? A5: While the foundation is just launching, the development and adoption of new payment standards typically occur incrementally. We can expect to see initial implementations and pilot programs in the coming years, with broader adoption following successful trials and regulatory alignment. Did you find this article insightful? Share your thoughts and help spread the word about the future of digital payments! Your engagement helps us bring more cutting-edge news to the crypto community. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain technology and its institutional adoption . This post Revolutionary AI Payment Standards: Coinbase and Cloudflare Pave the Way for Future Crypto Transactions first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Wall Street Firms Are Buying the Dip – Massive Rebound Comes Next
body: Bitcoin is holding near $112,961, steady despite a choppy week that rattled markets. The cryptocurrency trades with a daily volume of $51.2 billion and maintains a market cap above $2.25 trillion. While the dip has tested sentiment, Wall Street-linked firms and global treasuries are using the pullback to add aggressively to their Bitcoin holdings, signaling confidence that the next leg higher may not be far away. Treasuries Double Down Despite Weakness Several major Bitcoin treasuries announced fresh buys over the past week, undeterred by recent volatility. Strategy, led by Michael Saylor, added $99.7 million worth of Bitcoin, expanding its position even as its stock faced S&P 500 exclusion and dilution concerns. Strategy has acquired 850 BTC for ~$99.7 million at ~$117,344 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 26.0% YTD 2025. As of 9/21/2025, we hodl 639,835 $BTC acquired for ~$47.33 billion at ~$73,971 per bitcoin. $MSTR $STRC $STRK $STRF $STRD https://t.co/rG5pvryeYL — Michael Saylor (@saylor) September 22, 2025 Whereas, Japan’s Metaplanet made an even bolder move, purchasing $632 million in Bitcoin, raising its total holdings to 25,555 BTC worth roughly $3 billion. The biggest statement came from Strive, which completed a merger with Semler Scientific and immediately allocated $675 million to BTC. The combined entity will now hold over 10,900 BTC, valued at more than $1.2 billion. By paying a 210% premium on Semler’s stock, Strive also secured a profitable diagnostics business, but its primary focus remains building a formidable crypto treasury. Metaplanet has acquired 5419 BTC for ~$632.53 million at ~$116,724 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 395.1% YTD 2025. As of 9/22/2025, we hold 25,555 $BTC acquired for ~$2.71 billion at ~$106,065 per bitcoin. $MTPLF pic.twitter.com/CBhZi2X9lE — Simon Gerovich (@gerovich) September 22, 2025 These moves highlight institutional conviction. Far from retreating, some of Bitcoin’s largest corporate holders are scaling their exposure, reinforcing market stability during downturns. Key institutional buys this week: Strategy: $99.7M in Bitcoin Metaplanet: $632M purchase, 25,555 BTC total Strive + Semler merger: $675M BTC buy, 10,900 BTC total Institutional Confidence Could Fuel ETF Push The timing of these purchases is important. Espeically, with market regulators relaxing rules around digital asset exposure and Wall Street showing high demand for crypto-linked products, large treasuries may be setting the stage for broader ETF approval. Their confidence not only boosts sentiment but also provides a safety net against deeper sell-offs. As more corporations follow the playbook of Strategy and Metaplanet, Bitcoin could see demand outpace supply, particularly with the capped limit of 21 million coins. If institutional inflows persist, today’s consolidation near $113K may be remembered as a prime accumulation zone. Bitcoin Technical Picture: Key Levels to Watch On the charts, Bitcoin is trading just under the 200-EMA at $113,450, a line that bulls need to reclaim to ease selling pressure. The 50-EMA at $115,500 is the next test, while resistance stands at $116,150 and $118,000. Long lower wicks near $112,500 suggest dip-buying interest, but without a clear reversal candle, sellers still control momentum. Bitcoin Price Chart – Source: Tradingview The Relative Strength Index (RSI) at 36 shows oversold conditions, but traders want confirmation before betting on a rebound. If Bitcoin breaks below $113,000, the next supports lie at $110,850 and $108,750. On the upside, a clean break above $114,750 could set the stage for a rally back toward $120,000. For cautious traders, patience is key. Aggressive shorts may aim for $110,800, while long setups require a bullish engulfing pattern or hammer candle near support. Longer term, Bitcoin’s structure of higher lows since summer remains intact, suggesting the current weakness could evolve into an accumulation phase before the next rebound. Presale Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) Combines BTC Security With Solana Speed Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) is positioning itself as the first Bitcoin-native Layer 2 powered by the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM). Its goal is to expand the BTC ecosystem by enabling lightning-fast, low-cost smart contracts, decentralized apps, and even meme coin creation. By combining BTC’s unmatched security with Solana’s high-performance framework, the project opens the door to entirely new use cases, including seamless BTC bridging and scalable dApp development. The team has put strong emphasis on trust and scalability, with the project audited by Consult to give investors confidence in its foundations. Momentum is building quickly. The presale has already crossed $17.5 million, leaving only a limited allocation still available. At today’s stage, HYPER tokens are priced at just $0.012955—but that figure will increase as the presale progresses. You can buy HYPER tokens on the official Bitcoin Hyper website using crypto or a bank card. title: Bitcoin Cash Eyes $800 While Digitap Presale Rockets Toward $200K With No-KYC Crypto Card
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Cash Eyes $800 While Digitap Presale Rockets Toward $200K With No-KYC Crypto Card Bitcoin Cash (BCH) has emerged as one of late 2025’s best cryptocurrencies to invest in after a recent sell-off from the $650 level. Investors who have been sitting on the sidelines, waiting for a sell-off, are now paying attention. Bitcoin Cash is a fork of Bitcoin, known for its larger block size and faster transactions. The recent sell-off from around $650 to $600 has not invalidated the bullish narrative. Momentum indicators remain healthy; for example, the MACD is firmly positive while the RSI hovers around the mid-50s, indicating there is room to run despite recent weakness. The next level of support is far away at around $524, implying the investment narrative remains positive, although there is healthy reason for concern. Meanwhile, Digitap ($TAP) is gaining traction for its no-KYC crypto Visa card. The presale is showing signs of early success, having already raised $100,000 and is on track to hit the $200,000 milestone likely within days, which suggests a much higher level of investor interest in its vision of merging fiat and crypto finance. Bitcoin Cash can reach as much as $800, as its low fees and fast confirmations make it a useful tool for everyday spending, including small purchases and cross-border transfers. If more wallets, merchant processors, and e-commerce plugins embrace BCH, the market will award a higher price for the Bitcoin Cash token. Adding to the narrative is the 2024 halving that cut new BCH issuance, so there is less constant sell pressure from miners. Specifically, when issuance falls and on-chain usage modestly rises, prices will move disproportionately. However, there is some risk to the Bitcoin Cash story. If stablecoins on cheap networks gain traction or usage stalls, BCH will lose out on market share. This is not to say that the token will collapse; rather, investors can expect modest gains that result in average or maybe slightly higher-than-average returns. In other words, investors looking for steady gains should appreciate Bitcoin Cash’s story. But those seeking alpha should consider looking elsewhere. For short-term traders and investors asking what is the best crypto to buy, BCH has its appeal, but long-term seekers are looking elsewhere to find what crypto to invest in for 2025 and hold for years. The platform handles compliance in a user-friendly way, and early adopters are optimistic that this is the finance app to control their everyday and long-term financial goals. Digitap’s presale launched at a price of $0.0125 per TAP token and quickly surpassed the $100,000 raised milestone. Digitap’s website includes live updates on its presale, and current data show over 9.1 million $TAP tokens have been sold, generating more than $113,000 raised. This puts Digitap well on its way toward the $200,000 milestone, as the project’s visibility and awareness are only starting to pick up momentum. Early success makes it clear that investors recognize potential in Digitap’s model, perhaps even viewing it as a 10x or 20x opportunity given its low entry market cap and high utility. Crypto Card Is a Central Attraction It is reasonable to assume that since Digitap’s product is live, most investors took it for a “test run” before investing a single penny. This is no different than test-driving a car before taking it off the lot and represents a feature that very few other crypto projects offer. Like the product and are bullish in its outlook? title: Crypto Millionaires Witness Astonishing 40% Surge to 241,700 Globally
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Millionaires Witness Astonishing 40% Surge to 241,700 Globally The world of digital assets continues to astound, with a recent report highlighting an incredible surge in the number of crypto millionaires . This past year has seen an unprecedented expansion of wealth in the cryptocurrency space, capturing the attention of investors and analysts alike. It truly marks a significant milestone in the journey of digital finance. The Astonishing Rise of Crypto Millionaires According to a new crypto wealth report, jointly published by consulting firm Henley & Partners and global wealth data firm New World Wealth, the number of crypto millionaires has skyrocketed by approximately 40% in just one year. This remarkable growth brings the total count to an impressive 241,700 individuals who now hold at least $1 million in digital assets. It showcases the increasing mainstream adoption and profitability within the sector. A 40% surge in the number of crypto millionaires to 241,700. The ranks of crypto billionaires also swelled by 29%, reaching 36 individuals globally. A significant 60% of these wealthy individuals accumulated their fortunes primarily through Bitcoin. How Bitcoin Fuels the Crypto Millionaire Boom It is clear that Bitcoin remains the dominant force driving much of this digital wealth creation. The report explicitly states that about 60% of these newly minted crypto millionaires built their wealth predominantly through the world’s first and largest cryptocurrency. This highlights Bitcoin’s enduring appeal as a store of value and its pivotal role in the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. As institutional adoption grows and market sentiment improves, Bitcoin continues to solidify its position as a cornerstone asset. The study’s comprehensive findings were based on robust data from New World Wealth, which tracks over 150,000 high-net-worth individuals. This was further supplemented by detailed on-chain data and publicly available information from major cryptocurrency exchanges, ensuring a holistic view of the market’s dynamics. What This Means for the Future of Digital Wealth? The significant increase in crypto millionaires signals a maturing market and growing mainstream acceptance of digital assets. This isn’t just a fleeting trend; it reflects a fundamental shift in how wealth is generated and stored in the 21st century. It’s a testament to the resilience and potential of decentralized finance. For those considering entering the crypto space, this report offers a compelling narrative of potential, but also underscores the importance of informed decisions and understanding market nuances. Benefits: This trend demonstrates increasing liquidity and market depth, attracting more institutional and retail investment. It further validates cryptocurrency as a legitimate and powerful asset class. Challenges: Market volatility remains a significant factor, and regulatory landscapes are still evolving globally. Additionally, security concerns require constant vigilance from all participants. The astonishing surge in crypto millionaires underscores the transformative power of digital assets. With hundreds of thousands now holding substantial wealth in cryptocurrencies, and Bitcoin leading the charge, the financial landscape is undeniably shifting. This trend points towards a future where digital wealth plays an even more integral role, inviting both excitement and careful consideration from participants. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: How many crypto millionaires are there now? A1: According to a recent report, the number of crypto millionaires has surged to 241,700 globally. Q2: What percentage increase did crypto millionaires see? A2: The number of crypto millionaires increased by approximately 40% in the last year. Q3: Which cryptocurrency contributed most to this wealth surge? A3: Bitcoin was the primary driver, accounting for about 60% of the wealth accumulated by these new crypto millionaires . Q4: How many crypto billionaires are there currently? A4: The report indicates that the number of crypto billionaires increased by 29% to 36 individuals. Q5: What data sources were used for the report on crypto millionaires? A5: The study utilized data from New World Wealth, tracking over 150,000 high-net-worth individuals, alongside on-chain data and public information from major exchanges. The incredible rise of crypto millionaires is a story worth sharing! If you found this report insightful, please consider sharing this article with your network on social media. Spread the word about the evolving landscape of digital wealth and inspire further discussion about the future of finance. title: JPMorgan To Appear At Ripple Swell: What We Know So Far
body: The XRP community’s rumor mill just met hard evidence: Ripple’s official Swell speaker roster now lists Scott Lucas, Head of Markets Digital Assets at JP Morgan, among this year’s presenters. Swell 2025 will take place in New York City on November 4–5 (welcome reception on November 3) at Convene Hudson Yards, with Ripple billing it as its ninth annual gathering of “leaders in crypto, blockchain, payments and policy.” JPMorgan Is Joining The Ripple Swell Stage JPMorgan’s appearance is part of a broader Wall Street tilt to the agenda. The same speakers page shows Maxwell Stein (Director, Digital Assets, BlackRock), Ryan Rugg (Global Head of Digital Assets, Treasury & Trade Solutions, Citi), Cynthia Lo Bessette (Head of Fidelity Digital Asset Management, Fidelity), and Kim Hochfeld (Senior Managing Director and Global Head of Cash, Digital & Securities Lending, State Street Investment Management). The published agenda assigns Stein to a capital-markets tokenization discussion with Moody’s, and pairs Rugg and Lo Bessette on a panel about how global banks are shaping digital assets at scale. As of publication, Lucas’s specific session was not listed on the agenda. Lineups are subject to change, but the current program underlines heavyweight TradFi participation. The listing triggered predictable chatter on X. James Rule XRP (@RuleXRP) amplified the update with: “Now JPMorgan is going to be at Ripple Swell? ” Black Swan Capitalist (@VersanAljarrah) went further, asserting: “JPMorgan put their Head of Digital Assets on stage at Ripple Swell 2025. XRP is fully integrated into the banking infrastructure … adoption is inevitable.” Those are community interpretations, not confirmations of product integrations or partnerships; the only verifiable fact at this point is Lucas’s inclusion on Ripple’s official speaker slate. What To Expect Lucas’s remit at JP Morgan is directly relevant to what Swell typically explores. He oversees the strategy and execution of new trading products built on DLT/blockchain and represents the bank in industry initiatives; he also holds board roles at HQLAx and Ownera, and serves on the board of CLS Group—all touchpoints in the market plumbing of tokenized collateral, securities finance and post-trade. Context matters: JPMorgan has built one of the industry’s most advanced permissioned- blockchain stacks for wholesale finance. Its Onyx (now Kinexys Digital Assets) platforms span JPM Coin and tokenized-collateral rails used in repo and liquidity operations; recent milestones include tokenized MMF collateral and on-chain intraday repo workflows. That program has processed large volumes and is expanding to third-party apps—developments that dovetail with Swell’s tokenization and market-infrastructure themes. None of this implies an XRP integration; it does explain why a senior JP Morgan digital-assets executive belongs in the conversation Swell curates. What to watch from here is straightforward. First, Swell’s New York program already confirms BlackRock’s tokenization talk and a joint Citi–Fidelity panel on bank adoption—useful signaling about where institutional priorities sit in late 2025. Second, keep an eye on the agenda for a named session involving JPMorgan’s Lucas; as of now, only his speaker listing is public. At press time, XRP traded at $2.86.

title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holders Capitulate: 30K BTC In Realized Losses Over 24 Hours
body: Bitcoin is once again at a turning point as the market struggles to recover from heavy selling pressure. After losing the $115,000 level earlier this week, BTC is now fighting to hold $110,000, a threshold that many investors see as critical for maintaining short-term stability. The sharp drop has shaken confidence, with traders increasingly concerned about the possibility of a deeper correction if support fails. Related Reading: Aster Forms Bullish Hammer At Key Support – Reversal Setup? Market sentiment has shifted quickly from bullish optimism to caution, as volatility rises and momentum fades. The broader crypto market has mirrored Bitcoin’s moves, with altcoins also suffering significant declines. This phase of consolidation and retracement has left investors uncertain, unsure whether the recent dip represents a temporary pullback or the beginning of a larger corrective phase. Amid this turbulence, top analyst Darkfost highlighted a key onchain signal: it has been another painful day for short-term holders (STHs). Data shows that STHs realized losses of around 30,000 BTC in just one day. For many of the most recent buyers, unrealized profits have already evaporated, with some now selling at steep losses. Bitcoin STH Face Losses, But Market Outlook Holds Darkfost’s recent analysis highlights the mounting pressure on Bitcoin’s short-term holders (STHs). With BTC trading near $111,400, most of their unrealized profits have been nearly wiped out, leaving the newest market entrants facing realized losses. Data shows that STHs collectively absorbed an estimated 30,000 BTC in losses in a single day, underscoring the severity of the recent correction. For traders, this has been painful, but Darkfost argues it is actually constructive for the short-term outlook. He explains that when STHs capitulate, it often acts as a cleansing event for the market. Excessive leverage is flushed out, weak hands exit their positions, and the supply overhang diminishes. While “annoying in the very, very short term,” as Darkfost puts it, such resets typically create stronger foundations for the next move higher. This pattern has been observed in previous cycles, where brief periods of realized losses paved the way for sustained rallies once selling pressure subsided. At the macro level, conditions remain challenging as global markets digest tighter liquidity and slower economic growth. Still, many analysts believe Bitcoin is well-positioned in the long run, particularly as institutional adoption and regulatory clarity progress. In their view, current volatility may simply be part of the transition toward a healthier and more resilient market structure. Related Reading: Crypto Leverage Whipeout: $600M+ In BTC & ETH Longs Liquidated Price Analysis: Testing Support After Breakdown Bitcoin’s price action shows clear weakness after losing the $115K level, with the chart now testing support near $113K. The breakdown comes as the bullish momentum that fueled previous rallies fades, leaving BTC vulnerable to volatility. Currently, price trades below the 50-day moving average, signaling pressure in the short term. The 100-day SMA around $113,337 is now acting as a key support level, and its defense will be crucial to avoid a deeper correction. The recent drop highlights a rejection near the $123K resistance zone, where the market failed to build sustained momentum. If Bitcoin manages to hold above the $113K area, consolidation could follow before another attempt at recovery. However, a decisive move below this level risks exposing BTC to the $110K psychological level, where buyers are likely to step in. Related Reading: Tron Integration Marks Next Phase Of PayPal USD’s Multi-Chain Growth – Details Momentum indicators suggest the market remains in a corrective phase rather than a full reversal, with higher lows still intact from June levels. As long as BTC avoids a breakdown below $110K, the broader bullish structure remains valid. Traders will closely watch whether Bitcoin can stabilize above its current support or whether further selling pressure from long-term holders and broader market uncertainty drags it lower. Featured image from Dall-E, chart from TradingView

title: Bybit launches 24/5 stock CFD trading on its TradFi platform
body: BitcoinWorld Bybit launches 24/5 stock CFD trading on its TradFi platform Dubai, UAE, September 23rd, 2025, Chainwire Bybit , the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has introduced 24/5 trading for selected stock contracts for difference (CFDs) on its TradFi platform , expanding market access and aligning traditional assets more closely with crypto’s always-on trading model. The launch allows users to trade stock CFDs 24 hours a day, five days a week, uninterrupted. The first batch of 20 stock CFDs is now available under the extended trading framework. Existing positions remain unaffected, and trading as well as swap fees will continue to follow current rates. Since its debut in May 2025, Bybit’s stock CFD offering has expanded to support more than 100 equities, spanning leading technology firms such as NVDA (NVIDIA), MSTR (MicroStrategy), and META (Meta Platforms), as well as crypto-related stocks including COIN and CRCL. To further broaden accessibility, Bybit TradFi is also waiving trading fees on stock CFDs and indices through Oct. 11, 2025. During this limited-time program, eligible users can trade a range of global indices — including CHINA50, CHINAH, HK50, HKTECH, and TWINDEX — as well as all stock CFDs such as CRCL, COIN, MSTR, BMNR, SBET, and major technology equities including NVDA, TSLA, AAPL, GOOG, and INTC, at zero transaction cost. Previously, Bybit’s stock CFD trading followed standard U.S. market hours, limiting access to approximately 6.5 hours per day. Under those constraints, traders unable to act within the daily market window could not adjust positions or hedge risk until the next session. By introducing 24/5 trading, Bybit reduces time-zone barriers, enables continuous risk management, and allows users worldwide to respond more effectively to market developments. The change also provides cross-asset traders with a more unified experience, bridging the gap between crypto’s 24/7 market and traditional finance products. Key benefits of the update include: Always available: Stock CFDs on U.S. equities can now be traded around the clock, Monday through Friday. Global accessibility: Extended hours reduce time-zone limitations and open participation to a wider base of traders. Greater control: Users can manage positions on their own schedule, rather than being restricted to U.S. market hours. Bybit is among the first crypto-native platforms to introduce 24/5 trading for traditional financial assets. The company has positioned the expansion as part of its broader mission to bridge digital assets and traditional finance, while redefining the future of multi-asset trading. Disclaimer: Bybit TradFi is powered by Infra Capital Limited. #Bybit / #TheCryptoArk / #IMakeIt About Bybit Bybit is the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 70 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open, and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com . For more details about Bybit, please visit Bybit Press For media inquiries, please contact: media@bybit.com For updates, please follow: Bybit’s Communities and Social Media Contact Head of PR Tony Au Bybit media@bybit.com This post Bybit launches 24/5 stock CFD trading on its TradFi platform first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: US Stock Market Crypto: Unveiling Crucial Mixed Openings
body: BitcoinWorld US Stock Market Crypto: Unveiling Crucial Mixed Openings The financial world often watches traditional markets with bated breath, and recently, the three major U.S. stock indexes opened mixed. For those deeply invested in the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, understanding the nuances of the US stock market crypto relationship is absolutely crucial. While digital assets often march to their own beat, these traditional market movements can send ripples across the entire investment landscape, including your crypto portfolio. What Does a Mixed Stock Market Opening Mean for Crypto? On a recent trading day, we observed a fascinating split in traditional markets. The S&P 500 dipped slightly by 0.02%, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq fell by 0.04%. However, the Dow Jones Industrial Average showed a positive uptick, gaining 0.15%. This mixed bag of performance in the US stock market crypto context isn’t just an isolated event; it often reflects underlying economic sentiment that can influence investor behavior across all asset classes. S&P 500 & Nasdaq: Often seen as indicators of broader market health and tech sector performance, their slight declines could signal caution. Dow Jones: Its modest gain might point to strength in traditional industrial or value stocks, suggesting a rotation of capital. Such divergence can create uncertainty, prompting investors to reassess their risk appetite. This reassessment directly impacts how capital flows, potentially affecting the volatile crypto market. Navigating the Interconnectedness: US Stock Market Crypto Dynamics Many believe that cryptocurrencies, especially Bitcoin, act as a “digital gold” – a safe haven asset independent of traditional finance. However, recent years have shown a growing correlation between major cryptocurrencies and the stock market, particularly the Nasdaq. When the stock market faces headwinds, investors might pull back from riskier assets, and unfortunately, crypto is often categorized as such. Consider the macroeconomic factors at play. Inflation concerns, interest rate hikes by the Federal Reserve, and geopolitical events don’t just affect company earnings; they also influence liquidity and investor confidence. These factors create a powerful link between the US stock market crypto ecosystems. Key Dynamics to Observe: Risk-On/Risk-Off Sentiment: When traditional markets are “risk-off” (investors prefer safer assets), crypto often sees outflows. Conversely, a “risk-on” environment can fuel crypto rallies. Institutional Adoption: As more institutional money flows into crypto, its sensitivity to traditional market shifts increases. These large players often manage diversified portfolios where crypto is just one component. Therefore, a mixed stock market opening can signal a period of indecision or re-evaluation among these larger market participants. What Do Mixed Signals Mean for Your Crypto Portfolio? For the individual crypto investor, these mixed signals from the US stock market crypto interaction can be a source of both challenge and opportunity. It’s a reminder that no market exists in a vacuum. While Bitcoin and Ethereum have their unique supply-demand dynamics, they are not entirely immune to broader economic forces. Challenges: Increased Volatility: Uncertainty in traditional markets can amplify volatility in crypto, leading to sharper price swings. Difficulty in Prediction: Mixed signals make it harder to predict short-term crypto movements based solely on stock market performance. Opportunities: Diversification Reassessment: It’s a good time to review your portfolio’s diversification strategy. Are you overly exposed to a single asset class? Long-Term Perspective: For those with a long-term vision, market dips influenced by traditional market sentiment can present attractive entry points. Understanding these connections helps in making more informed decisions rather than reacting impulsively to daily price fluctuations. Actionable Insights for the Crypto Enthusiast So, how should crypto enthusiasts respond to a mixed traditional market opening and its implications for the US stock market crypto landscape? It’s about being prepared and strategic. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on key economic indicators and major stock market movements, not just crypto news. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Continue with a consistent investment strategy, regardless of short-term market noise. This helps mitigate risk. Research Projects: Focus on the fundamentals of the crypto projects you invest in. Strong projects with real utility are more likely to weather market storms. Manage Risk: Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Set clear stop-loss orders or take-profit targets to protect your capital. Remember, the crypto market is still relatively young and continues to mature. Its relationship with traditional finance is evolving, making continuous learning and adaptability key. Crucial Takeaways: Navigating the Interconnected Markets The mixed opening of the major U.S. stock indexes serves as a timely reminder of the complex interplay between traditional finance and the burgeoning world of digital assets. While the US stock market crypto relationship isn’t always one-to-one, ignoring it would be a disservice to informed investing. Crypto investors must remain vigilant, understand the broader economic context, and apply sound investment principles. By doing so, you can better position your portfolio to navigate both the challenges and exciting opportunities that lie ahead in these interconnected financial realms. Frequently Asked Questions About US Stock Market Crypto Dynamics Here are some common questions regarding the interaction between traditional stock markets and the crypto world: Q1: Do stock market movements always predict crypto price action? A1: Not always. While there’s a growing correlation, especially with Bitcoin and Ethereum, crypto can still have independent movements driven by unique factors like technological developments, regulatory news, or specific project adoption. It’s a relationship of influence, not direct causation. Q2: Why is the Nasdaq often more correlated with crypto than the Dow? A2: The Nasdaq is heavily weighted with technology stocks, which are often considered “growth” or “risk-on” assets. Crypto, being a relatively new and volatile asset class, is also often viewed as a “risk-on” investment, leading to similar investor sentiment and capital flows during periods of market optimism or caution. Q3: Should I adjust my crypto investments based on daily stock market news? A3: Frequent adjustments based on daily news can lead to impulsive decisions. It’s better to understand the broader trends and macroeconomic factors. For most investors, a long-term strategy like Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) and focusing on project fundamentals is more effective than reacting to short-term fluctuations. Q4: Can crypto act as a hedge against stock market volatility? A4: Historically, Bitcoin was sometimes seen as a hedge, but its correlation with tech stocks has increased. While it offers diversification due to its unique characteristics, its high volatility means it might not always provide the stability of traditional safe-haven assets during stock market downturns. It depends on the specific market conditions. Q5: What are “risk-on” and “risk-off” sentiments in investing? A5: “Risk-on” sentiment occurs when investors feel confident and are willing to invest in riskier assets like stocks and cryptocurrencies, seeking higher returns. “Risk-off” sentiment happens during periods of uncertainty or fear, leading investors to move capital into safer assets like government bonds, gold, or stablecoins, even if returns are lower. Found this analysis of the US stock market crypto connection insightful? Share this article with your fellow investors and crypto enthusiasts to help them navigate the complexities of today’s financial landscape. Your insights could spark valuable discussions! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and Ethereum price action. This post US Stock Market Crypto: Unveiling Crucial Mixed Openings first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Morgan Stanley Crypto Trading: Revolutionary Partnership Brings Digital Assets to E*Trade
body: BitcoinWorld Morgan Stanley Crypto Trading: Revolutionary Partnership Brings Digital Assets to E*Trade Get ready for a game-changer in the financial world! Morgan Stanley crypto trading is on the horizon, set to revolutionize how retail investors access digital assets. This exciting development means that cryptocurrency trading will soon be available on the popular E*Trade platform, thanks to a strategic partnership with crypto infrastructure provider Zero Hash. It’s a move that could significantly broaden the reach of digital currencies, bringing them directly to a massive new audience. What’s Driving Morgan Stanley Crypto Trading on E*Trade? Morgan Stanley, a titan in the investment banking sector, is making a bold move into the digital asset space. The plan involves integrating cryptocurrency trading directly into E*Trade, its retail-focused online brokerage. This isn’t just a minor update; it’s a significant strategic decision reflecting the growing demand for crypto exposure among mainstream investors. The collaboration with Zero Hash is key here. Zero Hash is a robust crypto infrastructure provider known for its secure and compliant solutions. Morgan Stanley previously participated in a $104 million funding round for Zero Hash, indicating a long-standing strategic interest and confidence in their capabilities. This partnership ensures that the new crypto trading service will be built on a solid foundation, emphasizing security and regulatory adherence. Initially, investors on E*Trade will have the opportunity to trade three major cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC): The original and largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Ethereum (ETH): The leading platform for decentralized applications and smart contracts. Solana (SOL): A high-performance blockchain known for its speed and scalability. This initial selection covers some of the most prominent and liquid digital assets, providing a strong entry point for new and existing E*Trade users. Why is This a Game-Changer for Retail Investors? The integration of Morgan Stanley crypto trading into E*Trade offers numerous benefits for everyday investors. Historically, accessing cryptocurrencies through traditional brokerage platforms has been limited. This new service bridges that gap, offering a streamlined and familiar experience for those already managing their investments with E*Trade. Think about the convenience: instead of juggling multiple accounts across different platforms, E*Trade users can soon manage their traditional stocks, bonds, and now cryptocurrencies all in one place. This consolidation simplifies portfolio management and can lead to a more holistic view of one’s financial assets. Moreover, E*Trade’s reputation for user-friendly interfaces and robust customer support will likely extend to its crypto offerings, making digital asset investment less daunting for newcomers. This move also signifies a broader acceptance of cryptocurrencies by established financial institutions. When a name like Morgan Stanley steps into the crypto arena, it lends significant credibility to the asset class. This can encourage more retail investors who might have been hesitant due to perceived risks or complexity to explore digital assets with greater confidence. Navigating the Future of Morgan Stanley Crypto Trading While the prospect of Morgan Stanley crypto trading is exciting, it’s also important to consider the broader implications and potential challenges. The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility, and regulatory landscapes are still evolving globally. Morgan Stanley and Zero Hash will undoubtedly prioritize robust security measures and compliance frameworks to protect investors. For investors, this new offering means easier access, but also the continued need for due diligence and understanding of the risks involved in crypto investments. Education will be paramount, and platforms like E*Trade are likely to provide resources to help users navigate this new frontier. The launch, expected in the first half of next year, will be closely watched by the industry, as it could set a precedent for other major brokerages. This partnership is a powerful signal that the lines between traditional finance and decentralized finance are blurring. It suggests a future where digital assets are an integral part of diversified investment portfolios, accessible through trusted, established channels. The collaboration between Morgan Stanley and Zero Hash is not just about adding a new product; it’s about shaping the future of retail investing. A Powerful Step Towards Broader Crypto Adoption The impending launch of Morgan Stanley crypto trading on E*Trade is a significant milestone for the cryptocurrency market. It represents a strong endorsement from a major financial player and promises to simplify access for millions of retail investors. By offering BTC, ETH, and SOL through a familiar platform, Morgan Stanley is paving the way for wider institutional and individual adoption of digital assets. This initiative could inspire other traditional brokerages to follow suit, further integrating cryptocurrencies into the mainstream financial system. It’s an exciting time for investors, offering new avenues for portfolio diversification and participation in the rapidly evolving digital economy. As the financial landscape continues to transform, partnerships like this underscore the growing importance and staying power of cryptocurrencies. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and Ethereum institutional adoption. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What cryptocurrencies will be available on E*Trade? Initially, the service will offer trading for Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Solana (SOL). When is Morgan Stanley planning to launch crypto trading on E*Trade? The launch is planned for the first half of next year. Who is Zero Hash and what is their role in this partnership? Zero Hash is a crypto infrastructure provider that will facilitate the cryptocurrency trading service on E*Trade. Morgan Stanley has previously invested in Zero Hash. Why is this partnership significant for retail investors? It allows retail investors to trade major cryptocurrencies directly through their familiar E*Trade platform, simplifying portfolio management and increasing accessibility to digital assets. What benefits does this bring to the broader crypto market? This move by a major financial institution like Morgan Stanley lends significant credibility to cryptocurrencies, potentially encouraging wider institutional and individual adoption and blurring the lines between traditional and decentralized finance. Connect with us on social media and let us know what you think about this pivotal development in the crypto space! title: Michelle Bowman warns that the Fed is already behind and needs faster, larger rate cuts
body: Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said the Fed is already late to fix the problem and needs to move fast. Speaking at the Kentucky Bankers Association’s 2025 convention, Michelle warned that after months of clear job market weakness, the central bank should not wait any longer to lower interest rates. She said: “Now that we have seen many months of deteriorating labor market conditions, it is time for the committee to act decisively and proactively.” This statement, according to a detailed report originally published by Bloomberg, puts Michelle directly at odds with more cautious voices on the committee. She said recent revisions in employment numbers point to deeper problems. “The recent data, including the estimated payroll employment benchmark revisions, show that we are at serious risk of already being behind the curve in addressing deteriorating labor market conditions,” she told the crowd. She was appointed to the Federal Reserve by President Donald Trump, who’s now back in the White House. Michelle is also the Fed’s lead bank regulator. Her message to the Federal Open Market Committee was:- do more, and do it faster. She also said, “Should these conditions continue, I am concerned that we will need to adjust policy at a faster pace and to a larger degree going forward.” Bowman calls out Fed’s delay and pushes for faster cuts Last Wednesday, Michelle joined the majority of her Fed colleagues to support a 25 basis point cut to the benchmark rate, as Cryptopolitan reported . That vote followed months of public and private pressure from the Trump administration. The committee now expects two more similar cuts before the year ends. But Michelle said that’s still not enough. She reminded the audience that since June, she’s been telling other policymakers that they should’ve already started cutting. Back in August, she said she wanted three rate cuts this year. She’s been pushing for more aggressive easing while others on the committee were still holding back. Her view lines up with Trump’s most recent Fed appointee, Governor Steve Miran, who made a speech earlier this week saying the economy was at risk unless interest rates dropped sharply. Steve said the current rate level is too restrictive and called for “a series of outsize cuts.” Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said last week that “growing signs of weakness in the labor market” played a big role in the committee’s decision to finally approve the September cut. On that front, Michelle also said she now believes the inflation effects from tariffs will likely be “small and short-lived.” While that statement shows some optimism, she still stressed the need to focus on the job market first. Goolsbee explains neutral rate and announces labor monitor Not many others are with Michelle on this though. Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said Tuesday on CNBC that while he backed the recent rate cut, the Fed “should be cautious about making additional rate reductions.” He added, “Eventually, at a gradual pace, rates can come down a fair amount if we can get this stagflationary dust out of the air.” But Goolsbee also warned that after four and a half years of inflation running hot, the Fed shouldn’t rush. Even though he’s not ready to speed up cuts, Austan admitted that the Fed’s current policy rate is higher than where it should be long-term. He said the “neutral” rate (that magic number that doesn’t push or pull on the economy) is likely around 3.1%, and he feels “comfortable” with that. Based on the committee’s “dot plot” projections, two more cuts are expected this year, with one cut per year after that. Austan said he’s fine with that timeline, but any additional changes would depend on how things play out in the economy. At the same time, Austan introduced a new labor market monitor developed by the Chicago Fed. It pulls data from 11 sources to track unemployment, layoffs, and hiring in real time. The system predicts September’s unemployment rate will hold steady at 4.3%. That’s still low historically, but it doesn’t cancel out the slowdown in hiring that’s been showing up in recent trends. He said the monitor will provide ongoing forecasts for layoffs and the rate of hiring among unemployed workers. So far, he said, the system is showing “a lot of stability” in the labor market, despite the broader signs of slowdown. Don’t just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Lamina1 Linea Partnership Unleashes Innovative Spaces for Creators
body: BitcoinWorld Lamina1 Linea Partnership Unleashes Innovative Spaces for Creators A groundbreaking collaboration is set to redefine digital ownership and interactive storytelling. The highly anticipated Lamina1 Linea partnership has officially launched ‘Spaces,’ an innovative platform designed to empower creators with true ownership of their intellectual property (IP) within the burgeoning Web3 landscape. This alliance brings together cutting-edge blockchain technology and a visionary approach to digital creativity, promising a new era for artists, writers, and developers alike. What Does the Lamina1 Linea Partnership Mean for Creators? Lamina1, the Layer 1 blockchain championed by American sci-fi visionary Neal Stephenson, is joining forces with Consensys’ robust Layer 2 network, Linea. This strategic alliance is not just a technical integration; it’s a foundational move to build a new frontier for digital creativity. Lamina1’s core mission is to create an open metaverse, providing the essential infrastructure for persistent virtual worlds. Linea, on the other hand, is known for its scalability and efficiency, offering a high-throughput environment for decentralized applications. The synergy between these two networks is crucial. Lamina1 establishes the secure, foundational layer for IP registration and and ownership, ensuring the integrity of digital assets. Linea’s Layer 2 solution then handles the high-volume, low-cost transactions and complex functionalities required for interactive experiences within ‘Spaces.’ This powerful combination means creators can develop intricate digital worlds and stories without worrying about prohibitive gas fees or network congestion, making the Lamina1 Linea partnership a game-changer. Unleashing Creative Potential: Key Benefits of ‘Spaces’ ‘Spaces’ is the direct outcome of this innovative Lamina1 Linea partnership , designed as a dedicated environment where creators can develop, own, and monetize their IP. It moves beyond traditional content creation models, offering robust tools for interactive storytelling and immersive experiences. This platform aims to provide unprecedented control and value back to the artists. The unique advantages offered by ‘Spaces’ are compelling: True Digital Ownership: Creators gain immutable, blockchain-backed ownership of their digital assets and IP. This fundamentally shifts control away from centralized platforms, allowing artists to dictate how their work is used and distributed. Innovative Monetization: ‘Spaces’ facilitates new revenue streams, enabling creators to directly benefit from their work through various Web3 mechanisms like NFTs, fractional ownership, and participation incentives, cutting out traditional intermediaries. Interactive Storytelling: The platform is built for dynamic, evolving narratives. Imagine branching storylines, user-generated content that influences game worlds, or collaborative storytelling experiences where communities co-create. Scalability and Efficiency: Leveraging Linea’s Layer 2 technology ensures that transactions are fast, secure, and cost-effective. This is crucial for high-volume creative activities, from minting digital art to facilitating in-game economies, without burdensome fees. Enhanced Security: Blockchain technology inherently offers greater transparency and security for digital assets, reducing risks of piracy and unauthorized use. This means artists can truly focus on their craft, knowing their creations are protected and valued. The Technology Behind the Vision: How Lamina1 and Linea Collaborate Understanding the technical architecture of the Lamina1 Linea partnership reveals why this collaboration is so effective. Lamina1, as a Layer 1 blockchain, serves as the bedrock. It’s where the fundamental rules of ownership and identity are established, providing the ultimate source of truth for all IP registered on ‘Spaces.’ This ensures that every digital asset has a verifiable, immutable record of creation and ownership. Linea, as an Ethereum-compatible Layer 2, operates on top of this foundation. Its role is to handle the vast majority of user interactions, computations, and transactions. By processing these off-chain (relative to Ethereum’s mainnet), Linea drastically reduces gas fees and increases transaction speed, offering a smooth and responsive user experience. The secure connection between Lamina1 and Linea allows for seamless asset transfers and data synchronization, creating a cohesive and powerful ecosystem. This layered approach is essential for building complex, interactive digital environments at scale. Navigating the Future of Digital IP with the Lamina1 Linea Partnership The launch of ‘Spaces’ through the Lamina1 Linea partnership represents a bold step forward in the evolution of the creator economy. It champions a future where creators are not just content providers but true digital proprietors. While the potential benefits are immense, the journey ahead will involve continuous innovation and user adoption efforts. Educating creators and consumers about the advantages of Web3 ownership and interactive experiences will be key to widespread success. This initiative could inspire a new wave of decentralized applications and platforms, further solidifying the principles of open ownership and collaborative creation. As ‘Spaces’ evolves, it will undoubtedly push the boundaries of what’s possible in digital storytelling and intellectual property management, setting a precedent for future metaverse and Web3 developments. The vision is clear: to build a more equitable and dynamic digital world for everyone. The Lamina1 Linea partnership is more than just a technological integration; it’s a statement about the future of the internet. By launching ‘Spaces,’ they are laying the groundwork for a digital realm where creators are genuinely empowered, and their intellectual property is respected and secured. This initiative promises to open up unprecedented opportunities for innovation in storytelling and digital ownership, paving the way for a vibrant, decentralized creator economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is ‘Spaces’ and what is its purpose? A1: ‘Spaces’ is a new platform launched through the Lamina1 Linea partnership . Its purpose is to provide creators with a dedicated environment to develop, own, and monetize their intellectual property (IP) through interactive storytelling and immersive experiences in the Web3 space. Q2: Who are Lamina1 and Linea, and why did they partner? A2: Lamina1 is a Layer 1 blockchain founded by sci-fi author Neal Stephenson, focused on building an open metaverse infrastructure. Linea is a Layer 2 network from Consensys, known for its scalability and efficiency. They partnered to combine Lamina1’s foundational security for IP ownership with Linea’s high-throughput, low-cost transaction capabilities, creating a robust platform for creators. Q3: What are the main benefits for creators using ‘Spaces’? A3: Creators benefit from true digital ownership of their IP, innovative monetization models, capabilities for interactive and evolving storytelling, enhanced security for their assets, and a scalable, cost-effective environment thanks to Linea’s Layer 2 technology. Q4: How does the Lamina1 Linea partnership ensure scalability for ‘Spaces’? A4: Scalability is ensured by leveraging Linea’s Layer 2 solution. While Lamina1 handles the foundational IP registration and security, Linea processes the majority of user interactions and transactions off-chain, significantly reducing gas fees and increasing transaction speed, which is vital for complex digital environments. Q5: What kind of IP can creators own and manage on ‘Spaces’? A5: ‘Spaces’ is designed to support a wide range of digital IP, including digital art, interactive narratives, game assets, virtual environments, and other forms of creative content that can be tokenized and managed on a blockchain. The focus is on empowering creators with ownership across various digital mediums. If you found this article insightful and believe in the power of creator-owned IP, share it with your network! Help us spread the word about the transformative potential of the Lamina1 Linea partnership and ‘Spaces’ by sharing this piece on your favorite social media platforms. Let’s champion a future where creators truly own their digital destiny. To learn more about the latest Web3 innovation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital ownership and blockchain gaming . This post Lamina1 Linea Partnership Unleashes Innovative Spaces for Creators first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Crypto News Today: Hybrid XRP ETF Debut and AVAX Joins ETF Optimism
body: The crypto market saw fresh developments today as institutional products and altcoin rallies took center stage. The debut of a hybrid XRP ETF signals growing interest in diversified crypto exposure, while Avalanche (AVAX) is riding a wave of bullish momentum amid broader ETF optimism. This market update is powered by Outset PR , the first data-driven crypto PR agency that delivers tangible visibility for blockchain projects. REX-Osprey Launches Hybrid XRP ETF REX Shares has officially launched the REX-Osprey XRP ETF, a first-of-its-kind hybrid product combining direct XRP holdings with derivatives exposure. The ETF quickly gained traction, recording $24 million in trading volume within just 90 minutes of launch. While that figure falls short of the massive debut volumes seen in Bitcoin ETFs, it’s a strong start given the current neutral sentiment in crypto markets (Fear & Greed Index: 40). The ETF’s hybrid structure is designed to appeal to institutions. By blending spot XRP and derivatives, it offers: Diversified exposure without requiring direct custody of XRP. Risk mitigation, since derivatives can help manage volatility. Access to payment-focused utility, tying into XRP’s broader role in cross-border settlement and stablecoin integrations like Ripple’s RLUSD. If inflows continue at a steady pace, this ETF could validate XRP’s positioning not just as a speculative asset, but as a backbone for payment solutions and tokenized finance. title: New Perpetual DEX Protocols Avantis & Aster Surge Amid Market Pullback with Bitcoin Hyper Ready to Launch
body: DeFi comes and goes, but the latest developments in the sector have surprised even experienced players. The perpetual DEX (decentralized exchange) sector has entered a cooling phase. Total value locked (TVL) declined from an all-time high of about $6.1B on September 13 to roughly $5.1 B by September 22. However, with gains of 600% and 2100%, respectively, two new entrants – Avantis ($AVNT) and Aster ($ASTER) – are quickly gaining traction, resisting the broader downturn with impressive increases in both token price and protocol adoption. Avantis: Rapid but Steady Growth Avantis’s native token ($AVNT) increased by 66% in just one week, rising from about $1.25 to $2.05. Its TVL also grew by nearly 27%, going from $17.7M to $22.6M in the same period. Avantis, a product of Coinbase, emphasizes innovative derivatives products and user-friendly interfaces as key factors attracting new liquidity. Unlike some older protocols, Avantis has customized features specifically for retail traders seeking alternatives to centralized platforms. The steady yet rapid growth indicates a sustainable influx of capital rather than mere speculative fever. With the token’s price rising 641% over the past month, investors are looking for further gains ahead. Aster: A Breakout Story Aster’s rally has been much more explosive. Its token surged 2213% in a month, jumping from $0.20 to $1.90 within that period. Even more remarkable was its TVL growth – a 228% increase from $370M to $1.21B between September 14 and 22. In Aster’s case, a key endorsement from Changpeng Zhao boosted credibility and visibility across the crypto community. It also helped that traders appear to be rotating away from underperforming incumbents like Hyperliquid and Jupiter, both of which saw token prices dip 8–10%, in search of higher-growth opportunities. Hyperliquid’s $HYPE token dropped about 9.3%, with TVL down 3.3%, while Jupiter saw an 8% token decline and TVL fell 5.6%. The picture is of Avantis and Aster benefiting at the expense of established projects, as capital is reallocated toward up-and-coming projects that appear to offer more upside. The Bigger Picture: Sustainable Growth or Short-Lived Hype? While the emergence of Avantis and Aster highlights the dynamism of the DeFi derivatives landscape, questions remain about sustainability. Surging TVL and token prices often correlate with speculative momentum, and history shows that hype can fade quickly once the initial excitement cools – as Hyperliquid discovered this past week. Can Bitcoin Hyper introduce a note of stability by opening the door for Bitcoin’s integration into the DeFi world? Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) – Unlocking Bitcoin-Native DeFi Applications With Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER), there is a chance for Bitcoin to reinvent itself. No longer simply a store of value, on the Hyper Layer 2, wrapped Bitcoin can be swapped at Solana-fast speeds. Microtransactions become feasible, with low fees and high throughput. And because final settlement remains on the Bitcoin Layer 1, there’s no sacrifice of speed and stability. $HYPER token holders get access to dApps built on the Hyper Layer 2, pre-sales, and all early-stage features. The presale roared past $17M as investors realized just how much potential Bitcoin Hyper holds. The success of $AVNT and $ASTER helps reinforce the potential $HYPER holds; learn how to buy $HYPER with our guide. Visit the presale page to learn more. The gains highlight a bigger trend: new protocols attract traders by promising innovation, improved user experiences, and higher potential returns, even as the overall perpetual DEX market consolidates. Whether Avantis and Aster can sustain their momentum remains uncertain, but $HYPER might be here for the long run. Authored by Aaron Walker, NewsBTC — https://www.newsbtc.com/news/binance-aster-soars-1800-in-a-week/

title: HBAR Surges 3.85% in Volatile Session as Institutional Buying Emerges
body: HBAR saw a volatile 23-hour stretch between Sept. 22 at 15:00 and Sept. 23 at 14:00, with the token trading in a narrow band between $0.217129 and $0.225507. The session opened with a sharp selloff that dragged prices to $0.217408 before heavy buying activity restored momentum. That rebound was reinforced by strong support at the $0.217129 level, as trading volume surged. Bulls then pushed prices to a peak just shy of $0.225507, though resistance emerged near $0.224358, capping further upside. By session’s end, HBAR closed at $0.222759, marking a 2.5% recovery from intraday lows and establishing a position above the range midpoint, signaling a bullish bias heading into the next phase of trading. The final hour of the session added another layer of optimism. HBAR posted a modest 0.06% gain in the tightly concentrated 60-minute window ending Sept. 23 at 14:08, trading within a constricted 0.40% range between $0.2221 and $0.2230. That narrow band reflected consolidation but also demonstrated underlying strength, as prices remained consistently above session midpoint levels. During this hour, volume spikes highlighted the intensity of market activity. A breakout at 13:27 drove turnover to 881,924 tokens, followed by an exceptional surge to 1.58 million tokens just before 14:00. Those bursts of participation helped reinforce support at $0.2221, while $0.2230 capped immediate upside efforts. Despite the constrained range, sustained demand suggested accumulation rather than exhaustion. Overall, the late-session performance extended HBAR’s broader 23-hour recovery trend. Bulls maintained control, with firm support levels intact and prices closing near the upper end of the range. The steady bid tone indicates continued bullish momentum heading into the next session, keeping market participants on watch for a potential breakout above short-term resistance. title: Mùa Altcoin đã trở lại: 3 động lực chính thúc đẩy đợt tăng giá
body: Theo dữ liệu từ Blockchain Center, mùa altcoin đã khởi động từ đầu tháng 9 khi 75% trong số 50 đồng tiền hàng đầu (ngoại trừ stablecoin) có hiệu suất tốt hơn Bitcoin trong 90 ngày qua. “Mùa altcoin” ám chỉ giai đoạn khi các loại tiền mã hóa ngoài Bitcoin ghi nhận mức tăng giá mạnh mẽ hơn đồng coin lớn nhất thị trường. Các chuyên gia nhận định, sự dịch chuyển vốn từ Bitcoin sang altcoin sẽ tiếp tục tăng tốc nhờ ba yếu tố: ngân quỹ doanh nghiệp ngày càng dồi dào, chi phí vốn rẻ hơn và môi trường pháp lý thuận lợi. Shane Molidor, nhà sáng lập ngân hàng đầu tư tiền điện tử Forgd, cho biết với tính chu kỳ của thị trường, “các nhà đầu tư nhiều khả năng sẽ dần tái cân bằng danh mục và phân bổ thêm vốn vào altcoin.” Trong khi đó, Bitcoin đã dẫn đầu chu kỳ này với mức giá kỷ lục và sự chú ý lớn từ Phố Wall. Chỉ riêng trong năm nay, các quỹ ETF Bitcoin đã thu hút gần 10 tỷ USD, được vận hành bởi những tập đoàn đầu tư khổng lồ như BlackRock, theo SoSoValue. Tuy nhiên, tỷ lệ thống trị của Bitcoin đã giảm gần 6% trong 6 tháng qua, hiện chỉ còn chiếm 58% tổng vốn hóa thị trường 4 nghìn tỷ USD, theo TradingView. Đồng thời, chỉ số alt season của CoinMarketCap đã tăng lên 71 so với mức 44 tháng trước, còn chỉ báo của Coinglass đạt 80/100 – dấu hiệu rõ ràng cho thấy altcoin đang lấy lại đà tăng. Những con số này đang thách thức giả định của nhiều quỹ phòng hộ rằng Bitcoin sẽ tiếp tục thống trị thị trường trong thời gian dài. Cục Dự trữ Liên bang Mỹ (Fed) Sự lạc quan của thị trường altcoin đang gia tăng trong bối cảnh Cục Dự trữ Liên bang Mỹ (Fed) dự kiến sẽ cắt giảm lãi suất vào thứ Tư. Theo công cụ CME FedWatch, giới đầu tư gần như chắc chắn về động thái này, điều sẽ bơm thêm thanh khoản mới vào hệ thống tài chính toàn cầu. Chi phí vay thấp hơn khuyến khích các nhà đầu tư tìm đến tài sản rủi ro như tiền điện tử – vốn có xu hướng tăng giá mạnh trong môi trường thanh khoản dồi dào. Khi khẩu vị rủi ro tăng, “chúng ta có thể chứng kiến dòng vốn được phân bổ sâu hơn, trong đó các token layer 2 hàng đầu và các token hệ sinh thái có TVL, khối lượng và doanh thu giao thức cao sẽ trở thành ứng cử viên sáng giá cho việc đưa vào ngân quỹ,” Molidor nhận định. Phần lớn trader dự đoán Fed sẽ giảm lãi suất 0,25%, nhưng vẫn có một khả năng nhỏ là mức cắt giảm sẽ sâu hơn, tới 0,5%. Một động thái mạnh tay hơn có thể “kích hoạt một đợt tăng giá đáng kể cho thị trường crypto, bởi hầu như không ai thực sự kỳ vọng vào điều đó,” Kyle Chasse – nhà sáng lập quỹ đầu tư mạo hiểm MV Global – chia sẻ với DL News. Các công ty Treasury trong lĩnh vực crypto Các công ty quản lý ngân quỹ tiền điện tử (crypto treasury) đang nổi lên như động cơ đòn bẩy của chu kỳ này, hút về hàng tỷ USD vốn tổ chức. Theo Sean Dawson, trưởng bộ phận nghiên cứu tại Derive, bằng cách phát hành nợ và mua tiền mã hóa, các Digital Asset Treasuries (DATs) tạo ra một “vòng quay phản xạ” thúc đẩy biến động giá. Annabelle Huang, nhà sáng lập nền tảng thực thi Altius, chia sẻ với DL News rằng đà tăng trưởng của các kho bạc altcoin “nhiều khả năng sẽ tiếp tục đối với những altcoin chất lượng cao có doanh thu bền vững – miễn là chính các DAT có cấu trúc vững chắc và duy trì được nguồn vốn giá rẻ.” Bà cũng nhấn mạnh rằng các công ty ngân quỹ thường sẽ chọn token từ những blockchain đã được kiểm chứng, có tokenomics bền vững, hệ sinh thái năng động và chỉ số người dùng lành mạnh. Tuy nhiên, “đà tăng sẽ nhanh chóng tan biến đối với những dự án không đáp ứng đủ hai điều kiện trên,” Huang cảnh báo. Theo Shane Molidor, những altcoin có khả năng hưởng lợi nhiều nhất từ dòng vốn của các công ty treasury là những cái tên quen thuộc như Ethereum, Solana, Binance Smart Chain, Sui, cùng các token hệ sinh thái hàng đầu của chúng. Sự rõ ràng trong quy định Tuần trước, thị trường tiền điện tử đã nhận được sự ủng hộ lớn nhất từ chính phủ Mỹ cho đến nay. Paul Atkins, Chủ tịch Ủy ban Chứng khoán và Giao dịch Mỹ (SEC), tuyên bố rằng “đã đến thời của crypto” và cam kết chấm dứt nhiều năm đối đầu từ cơ quan quản lý này. Sáng kiến Project Crypto của SEC sẽ “làm rõ rằng phần lớn token tiền điện tử không phải là chứng khoán, đồng thời tạo ra một khung pháp lý thống nhất cho các nền tảng giao dịch, cho vay và staking,” qua đó xóa bỏ nhiều năm tranh cãi về altcoin . Hiện cơ quan này đang xem xét hơn 90 sản phẩm giao dịch trao đổi (ETP), bao gồm các đơn đăng ký liên quan đến những đồng altcoin như Solana, XRP và Litecoin. Hạn chót để SEC ra quyết định với một số hồ sơ sẽ bắt đầu từ giữa tháng 10, trong đó các nhà phân tích như Balchunas dự đoán khả năng phê duyệt cao cho các altcoin lớn như Litecoin và XRP. Một số hạn chót khác đã được dời sang giữa tháng 11. Cam kết của SEC trong việc xây dựng thêm khung pháp lý cho crypto cũng diễn ra trong bối cảnh Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump công khai ủng hộ tài sản kỹ thuật số và thúc đẩy chính sách thân thiện với ngành. Sự tích lũy của Bitcoin Để có một đợt “altcoin rally” toàn diện như các chu kỳ trước, cả việc xoay vòng lợi nhuận và niềm tin của nhà đầu tư đều là yếu tố then chốt, theo Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, Phó CEO của sàn Bitpanda. “Khi Bitcoin tích lũy và nhà đầu tư bắt đầu xoay vốn sang các tài sản rủi ro cao hơn, chúng ta thường chứng kiến altcoin tăng mạnh mẽ hơn,” ông nói. Biến động thị trường crypto Bitcoin (BTC): tăng 1,1% trong 24 giờ qua, hiện giao dịch ở mức 117.200 USD. Ethereum (ETH): tăng 0,5% trong 24 giờ qua, hiện ở mức 4.540 USD. Altcoin tiềm năng 2025: Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) nổi bật trong làn sóng mới Trong bối cảnh mùa altcoin đang bùng nổ, Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) nhanh chóng thu hút sự chú ý nhờ tokenomics sáng tạo và cộng đồng phát triển mạnh mẽ. Dự án hướng tới việc kết hợp yếu tố meme với ứng dụng thực tế trong hệ sinh thái Web3, mang lại sự cân bằng giữa tính giải trí và giá trị sử dụng. Hiện tại, HYPER đang trong giai đoạn presale và đã ghi nhận dòng vốn đổ vào đáng kể, phản ánh niềm tin ngày càng lớn từ phía nhà đầu tư. Với đà tăng trưởng của thị trường altcoin, HYPER được xem là một trong những lựa chọn nổi bật cho những ai muốn đa dạng hóa danh mục và tìm kiếm tiềm năng sinh lời cao trong năm 2025.

title: Ethereum Hits Losing Streak: How Massive Liquidations Impact ETH Price
body: Ethereum has entered a sharp losing streak, with cascading liquidations and technical weakness fueling volatility across the market. A wave of $1.8 billion in long liquidations on September 23 wiped out more than 370,000 traders, leaving Ethereum (ETH) particularly exposed. This market update is powered by Outset PR , the first data-driven crypto PR agency that equips blockchain projects with precise, effective strategies to boost visibility. $1.8B Liquidations Trigger ETH Sell-Off The crypto market’s heavy reliance on leverage has once again backfired. ETH futures accounted for over $500 million of the $1.8 billion long liquidation, underscoring Ethereum’s vulnerability to sudden drawdowns. Leverage risk: With the average funding rate at +0.0029%, traders were heavily overexposed. Domino effect: When ETH broke below $4,150, stop-losses and margin calls triggered a cascading sell-off. Open interest: ETH derivatives open interest surged 19% in 24h, showing volatility was amplified by excessive speculation. The high-leverage environment created a fragile setup where a single breakdown sparked a chain reaction of forced selling. Technical Weakness Adds Pressure ETH also faces mounting technical headwinds after failing to hold critical levels. Pivot breakdown: ETH slipped below its 24h pivot point at $4,250. Resistance: The 38.2% Fibonacci retracement at $4,624 now serves as resistance. Beyond that, MACD histogram at -33.17 signals clear bearish momentum, while the RSI at 40.46 is weak but not oversold, leaving room for further downside. Price targets: Short-term traders are eyeing $4,092 (September 23 low) as the next support.Long-term structure remains intact as long as ETH holds above the 200-day EMA ($3,403), suggesting investors aren’t panic-selling yet.
